name: Sniper Elite III - Save Churchill Part 1: In Shadows
name_original: Sniper Elite III - Save Churchill Part 1: In Shadows
description:
Sniper Elite III - Save Churchill Part 1: In Shadows is an action-shooter game developed by Rebellion. It came out on 17-07-2014. 505 Games published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Sniper Elite III - Save Churchill Part 1: In Shadows is available on PC.
